comments:
The following open view actions show red icons:

-UML2 Host Interactions
-Execution Flow
-UML2 Agent Interactions
-UML2 Class Interactions
-UML2 Process Interactions
-UML2 Thread Interactions

I suspect this is a packaging issue.

Created an attachment (id=54029)
screen capture of context menu

confirm that build contains the icons in package.
